description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Grab some friends and jump into this hybrid dual-stick shooter/tower defense game. Defend your families' underground home from waves of flesh-eating lizards. You're outnumbered badly, but some well placed defenses and a steady aim may get you through the night. Unique fusion of action and strategy. 40 rounds, 3 nights, 8 power-ups, 3 upgradeable turret types, endless strategies. HamStudios.com
